thread.section_title: Centauro Rent a Car opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Centauro Rent a Car | centauro.net
thread.title: P P
thread.title_full: Centauro Rent a Car evaluado por P P

author: P P
title: P P
text: What a company!! Easy booking! Great friendly service all the time!! Arived at Mallorca airport where company bus been waiting already only for us! Once arived at office had a friendly welcome buy very friendly staff! It took about 5 minutes and we had the keys for the car! Company upgraded car because we had our son with us for free of charge! The car we got from them a Ford Focus 1.6 petrol in imaculate condition with about 6000 miles on the clock! On the way back just droped of the key and we where on the way back to the airport! Will use again! Well done guys
